review: This highly touted device was extremely disappointing. There are only a few channels that it accesses. It is great if all you want do is watch Netflix, Amazon, and Hulu. But Roku is the same price and offers a greater variety of channels. One of my favorites on Roku is Acorn TV, which is all British shows, but Amazon does not have even this variety. I gave it to my daughter--I have no use for it.

review: For all the people with HULU stuttering issues, the problem is with the stock power adapter. I was able to resolve the issue with both of my fire tv stick's by plugging the power into my XBOX's. It also worked with an standard iphone USB adapter. Not sure if Amazon went cheap on the power blocks or if they are purposely filtering down the 5volts, possibly to extend the life of the device or prevent overheating but it comes at the expense of the sticks performance. I love the firetv stick and would suggest it to anyone.
